Description.Platinum_Description: Deep in the forest is the Old Chateau. It is falling into disrepair after being abandoned by its owner.

Description.White 2_Description: The town is famous for a clock tower that tells of the town's beginnings.

Description.ORAS_Description: This route is popular among Trainers because it offers the chance to stroll while gazing up at Mt. Chimney.

Description.LGPE_Description: A popular spot for swimming and sunbathing.

Trainers seeking to become the best arrive here after enduring a long and grueling journey.

Description.ORAS_Description: People from many different regions gather and mingle in this bustling port city.
Description.SM_Description: A cave that leads deep, deep down under the ground. How it got the name "resolution" is not known.
Description.USUM_Description: A natural path that winds among the many trees. It leads to the eastern side of Poni Island.

Description.DP_Description:
This city was made by carving out steep, rocky mountains. Its isolation limits its contact with other cities.
The city puts effort into providing entertainment. Naturally, one can find a Gym here.
Conveniently located right next door to the Game Corner is the Prize Exchange.
At the highest point in the city is Team Galactic's headquarters.
There are warehouses for storing a variety of goods. There is also a major department store.
Description.Platinum_Description: One of the lakes that is symbolic of the water-rich Sinnoh Region. There is an odd legend associated with it. A high-class restaurant is located on a hill overlooking the lake.
Description.HGSS_Description: A short road that leads to the blocked-off Underground Path.
Description.Black 2_Description: A pastoral road where Trainers challenge one another.
Description.White 2_Description: A pastoral road where Trainers challenge one another.
Description.ORAS_Description: This city, which rises from the crater of a great meteoroid crash, can only be reached through the sea or from the sky.
Description.SM_Description: A major street that has developed so much thanks to the Battle Royal Dome being on it, making it look like a city street.
Description.USUM_Description: A place where purple flowers bloom in abundance. You can gather the nectar Oricorio loves to feed on here.

Description.DP_Description: One of the lakes that is symbolic of the water-rich Sinnoh Region. There is an odd legend associated with it. It is possible to enter the cave underneath the lake from the island in the middle.
Description.Platinum_Description:
This city was made by carving out steep, rocky mountains. Its isolation limits its contact with other cities.

Description.HGSS_Description: A short road that leads to the blocked-off Underground Path.
Description.Black 2_Description: In autumn, fallen leaves accumulate and hide the ground beneath.
Description.White 2_Description: In autumn, fallen leaves accumulate and hide the ground beneath.
Description.ORAS_Description: This small island is surrounded by a mysterious veil that makes approach impossible for mere humans.
Description.SM_Description: The ruins that enshrine Tapu Bulu, one of the land spirits. It is said that life grows here.
Description.USUM_Description: The entrance to Poni Island. It connects to Seafolk Village.

Description.DP_Description:
Trainers seeking to become the best arrive here after enduring a long and grueling journey.
Victory Road is the last and toughest of the challenges leading up to the Pokémon League.
Description.Platinum_Description: One of the lakes that is symbolic of the water-rich Sinnoh Region. There is an odd legend associated with it. It is possible to enter the cave underneath the lake from the island in the middle.
Description.HGSS_Description: A road that forms a maze crossing a small, rocky mountain.
Description.Black 2_Description: Many rocks make swimming difficult. Proud swimmers come to show off.
Description.White 2_Description: Many rocks make swimming difficult. Proud swimmers come to show off.
Description.ORAS_Description: Thanks to the prevailing wind pattern, this town is always kept clear of falling volcanic ash.
Description.SM_Description: The ruins that enshrine Tapu Koko, one of the land spirits. It is said that life is tested here.
Description.USUM_Description: A cave that leads deep, deep down under the ground. How it got the name "resolution" is not known.

Description.HGSS_Description: An amusement park outside Fuchsia City where many rare Pokémon can be observed in the wild. Catch them in a popular game!FRLG
Description.Black 2_Description: A lot of ups and downs and ledges make the route a natural maze.
Description.White 2_Description: A lot of ups and downs and ledges make the route a natural maze.
Description.ORAS_Description: This challenging path forces Trainers who hope to overcome the Pokémon League to first surpass their own limits.

Description.USUM_Description: A major street that has developed so much thanks to the Battle Royal Dome being on it, making it look like a city street.

Description.HGSS_Description: A huge lake full of clear, blue water.

Description.HGSS_Description: A naturally large cavern that is incredibly spacious.
